results.releaseNotes: 온라인에서 대화를 나눌 때는 신속함과 안정성이 핵심입니다. 더욱 빠르고 안정해진 LinkedIn 앱을 만나보세요. 버그가 수정된 버전입니다.
results.description:
이직이나 구직, 커리어 개발 등을 고민하고 계신가요? LinkedIn에서 스마트하게 달성하세요. 인맥 근황이나 업계 최신 소식 등도 한곳에서 쉽게 알 수 있습니다.

앱을 다운로드해서 언제 어디서나 LinkedIn의 전체 기능을 쉽고 빠르게 이용하세요.

LinkedIn앱이 좋은 점:

1. 나에게 맞는 채용공고를 찾고 추천 받음 앱에서 클릭 한번으로 채용공고에 쉽게 지원
2. 주목하고 있는 메일, 업계 소식, 채용공고가 올라오면 바로 알림을 받음
3. 나와 가까이 위치한 인맥이 있는지 찾아보고 쉽게 1촌을 맺어서 인맥을 키움

프로필
• LinkedIn 프로필을 이력서처럼 활용
• 주목할 만한 경력과 이력 강조 
• 프로필 사진을 넣어서 보는 사람의 기억에 남도록 함

인맥 가꾸기
• 친구, 동문, 동료 등을 인맥으로 관리
• 인맥의 근황을 살피면서 연락을 주고 받음
• 관심 있는 회사나 유명인사, 토픽 등을 팔로우

채용공고 찾기
• 채용 중인 공고를 검색하고 간편하게 지원
• 이력서를 저장해 둔 후 내가 적임자가 되는 채용공고에 바로 전송
• 원하는 검색어에 관련된 채용공고가 올라오면 바로 알림을 받음
• 지원하려는 회사에 근무하는 1촌에게 채용 추천을 부탁하여 채용될 가능성을 크게 높임

최신 정보
• 도움이 되는 글, 댓글, 정보를 인맥과 공유
• 스마트하게 선정된 업계 소식을 바로바로 받아봄
• 관심 있는 해시태그나 토픽을 팔로우하여 관련 글을 받아봄

앱에서 만나는 특별한 기능
• 주변 인맥 찾기: 근처에 1촌이 있는지 스캔한 후 알려줌
• QR 코드 스캔: QR 코드로 쉽게 1촌 맺기
• 푸시 알림: 1촌 신청이 오면 앱을 열지 않아도 휴대폰 화면에 바로 뜸

이직/구직, 정보력 강화, “나”라는 사람 알리기, 커리어에 도움이 되는 사람들과 연락하며 지내기 등 LinkedIn 앱에서 모두 이루어집
니다.


LinkedIn 앱은 무료로 다운로드할 수 있습니다.
---------------------------

LinkedIn을 더 제대로 활용하고 싶다면? 프리미엄으로 업그레이드하세요. 채용공고 탐색, 사업체 성장, 영업기회 찾기, 인재 채용 등
에 유리한 멤버십을 다양한 가격대(월 $29.99 ~ 월 $119.95)에 이용할 수 있습니다.

멤버십은 자동으로 연장되고, 비용은 현재 이용 기간이 끝나기 24시간 전에 아이튠즈 계정으로 청구됩니다. 원하실 경우 현재 이용 기간이 끝나기 24시간 이전에 자동 연장 기능을 해제하세요. 자동 연장 기능은 언제든지 아이튠즈 계정 설정에서 해제할 수 있지만, 이
미 일부 기간을 사용한 경우 남은 기간에 대한 비용을 환불해 드리지 않습니다. 위의 멤버십 비용은 미국에 한합니다. 멤버십 비용은 국가마다 다르고, 현지 통화로 청구됩니다.

개인정보 취급방침: https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy
서비스약관: https://www.linkedin.com/legal/user-agreement

results.releaseNotes: 일반 버그 수정, 성능 개선
results.description:
LinkedIn 채용 공고 검색은 효율적인 이직과 구직을 위한 앱입니다.

원하는 조건에 해당하는 채용 공고를 쉽고 빠르게 찾아볼 수 있습니다. 지역, 특정 검색어를 바탕으로 알림과 추천 채용 공고를 받으세요. LinkedIn 프로필로 입사지원할 수도 있습니다. 회원님의 구직/이직 활동은 다른 사람이나 LinkedIn 1촌에게 절대 공개되지 않습니다.

LinkedIn 채용 공고 검색 앱의 기능:
• 직책, 지역, 키워드로 쉽게 채용 공고를 검색
• 저장한 검색어, 조회한 채용 공고, LinkedIn 프로필을 바탕으로 한 채용 공고 추천
• 조건에 해당하는 채용 공고가 새로 올라올 경우 알림 받기
• LinkedIn 프로필로 입사지원하는 쉽고 간편한 입사지원 절차
• 1촌이나 다른 사람에게 구직/이직 활동이 공개되지 않음

LinkedIn 채용 공고 검색 앱은 무료입니다. 나와 다른 지원자 비교, 채용 회사의 채용 동향 등 고급 분석 정보를 보려면 월 $29.99에 프리미엄 멤버십을 이용하세요.

멤버십에 가입하면 멤버십이 매월 자동으로 연장됩니다.  멤버십 비용은 현재 이용 기간이 끝나기 24시간 전에 아이튠즈 계정으로 청구됩니다. 원하실 경우 현재 이용 기간이 끝나기 24시간 이전에 자동 연장 기능을 해제하세요. 자동 연장 기능은 언제든지 아이튠즈 계정 설정에서 해제할 수 있지만, 이미 일부 기간을 사용한 경우 남은 기간에 대한 비용을 환불해 드리지 않습니다.

위의 멤버십 비용은 미국에 한합니다. 멤버십 비용은 국가마다 다르고, 현지 통화로 청구됩니다.

개인정보 취급방침: https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy
서비스약관: https://www.linkedin.com/legal/user-agreement

results.releaseNotes: - 마이너 버그 수정 및 안정화 작업이 적용되었습니다.
results.description:
대한민국 직장인 필수 앱 블라인드!
50,000개 이상 기업에 재직 중인 현직자들과 솔직한 이야기를 나누세요!
 
블라인드(Blind)는 인증된 직장인들의 익명 커뮤니티입니다. 특허 받은 암호화 로직을 통해 개인 정보를 전혀 저장하지 않아, 여러분의 익명 활동을 철저히 보장합니다.
 
- 토픽 채널: 모든 블라인드 회원들과 관심있는 주제에 대해 이야기 나누는 공간
- 우리 회사: 같은 회사 동료들끼리 속마음을 나누는 공간
- 라운지: 같은 업계, 같은 직군 사람들끼리 교류하는 공간
 
* 앱 사용 중에 개선을 원하시는 부분이 있으면 아래 메일로 보내주세요.
support@teamblind.com

* 광고 및 사업제휴 문의는 아래 메일로 보내주세요.
ads@teamblind.com

results.releaseNotes: 앱의 안정성이 개선되었습니다.
results.description:
멋진 회사 딱 맞는 일자리, 원티드
연봉 검색부터 취업과 구직 이직까지 모든 것이 편리해 집니다.

* 대한민국 모바일 어워드 대상 (2016)

지금 바로 원티드가 제안하는 딱 맞는 일자리를 알아보세요. 지인에게 맞는 좋은 기회를 소개해 주고, 채용 시 파격적인 보상금도 받으세요.


특징 :

• 취업 정보 탐색에 특화된 UI – 수많은 일자리 속에서 원티드가 제안하는 멋진 회사를 터치 몇 번만으로 손쉽게 살펴보세요. 에디터 추천, 맞춤 추천, 테마 추천, 태그 탐색, 검색 기능을 제공합니다.

• 간편한 인재 추천과 보상 – 언제 어디서든 클릭 몇 번으로 손쉽게 일자리를 지인에게 추천하세요. 채용 시 합격자와 추천사 작성자 모두에게 최대 150 (최소 50) 만원의 보상금을 드립니다. 

• 관심사에 따른 맞춤 채용 정보 알림 – 나의 관심이나 적성에 잘 맞는 자리를 찾기가 어려웠나요? 관심사를 설정해 놓으면 알림을 통해 나에게 딱 맞는 취업 기회를 놓치지 않을 수 있습니다.

• 내 직무의 연차별 평균 연봉 - 연봉 협상을 앞두고 있을 때 업계의 평균 연봉을 참고로 준비해 보세요. 그리고 이직을 계획 중이라면 연봉을 업그레이드할 수 있는 포지션들을 알아보세요.

원티드의 리쿠르팅 및 네트워킹 이벤트 소식을 가장 먼저 알고 싶다면?

페이스북 팬페이지 http://facebook.com/wantedkr 팬이 되어주세요!

앱을 쓰다가 궁금하거나 불편한 부분이 있다면 언제든지 cs@wantedlab.com 으로 연락해주세요. 여러분의 의견을 기다리고 있습니다.


원티드에서는 서비스 제공을 위해서 아래의 접근권한을 필요로 합니다.
- 카메라 : 프로필로 설정할 사진 촬영시
- 사진 : 프로필로 설정할 사진 선택시
- 푸시 알림 : 지원 현황 및 관심 채용 정보 수신시

* 위 접근권한은 특정 기능을 사용할 때 허용이 필요하며, 허용하지 않더라도 원티드를 이용하실 수 있습니다.

results.releaseNotes: 버그 개선과 다양한 개선점들
results.description:
Scannable은 종이를 한 단계 진화시킵니다. 계약서, 영수증, 명함을 비롯해 여러분에게 생기는 모든 종이를 스캔하세요. 문서를 즉시 저장 또는 공유하고 다음으로 넘어갈 수 있습니다.
 
어디서나 자동으로 고품질 스캔을 캡처하세요
- 빠른 스캔 속도: 카메라를 문서, Post-it® 노트, 화이트보드에 갖다 대세요. Scannable이 즉시 캡처합니다.
- 시간 절약: Scannable은 이미지를 자동으로 회전하고, 자르고, 조정해 또렷하고 읽기 쉬운 스캔을 만들어 줍니다.
- 공유 또는 저장: 이메일이나 텍스트로 동료들에게 문서를 보내거나 Evernote 및 다른 앱에 저장하세요.
 
전문가답게 종이를 다루세요
- 명함을 연락처로 전환하세요: 명함과 LinkedIn의 정보를 끌어오고 프로필 사진을 추가해 연락처 목록에 저장하세요.
- 서류더미를 없애세요: Scannable은 ScanSnap Evernote 에디션 스캐너와 매끄럽게 연계해 사용할 수 있습니다. 여러 페이지의 문서를 필요한 곳에 정리하세요.
- 모두를 위한 스캐너: Scannable을 사용하면 전체 팀이 각자 자신의 장치에서 ScanSnap Evernote 에디션을 제어해 필요한 곳으로 종이를 보낼 수 있습니다.

Scannable은 무료로 다운로드해 사용할 수 있습니다.

Love LinkedIn Learning? Rate the app! Your feedback shows us what matters. Plus: the app includes a Help Center to answer your questions.
results.description:
Advance your career with LinkedIn Learning. Discover the most in-demand business, tech and creative skills with personalized recommendations and courses taught by industry experts.

Learn on the go with the LinkedIn Learning iOS app.

Get the skills you need to succeed by watching bite-sized video courses anytime, anywhere.

Learn from courses taught by industry experts in leadership, management, marketing, programming, IT, photography, graphic design, web and interactive design, 3D animation and much more.

Get the most out of your LinkedIn Learning membership with the app:
• Access 4,000+ courses in business, tech and creative with more added each month
• Get personalized course recommendations
• Download courses for offline viewing
• Explore curated courses for a guided learning experience
• Save courses to watch later
• Watch entire courses or individual videos at your own pace
• Share courses with your network
• Add certificates of completion to your LinkedIn profile
• Access to LinkedIn Premium networking tools, and exclusive insights like Who's Viewed Your Profile

LinkedIn Learning app is free to download. With a subscription plan, you can watch the full courses across technology, creative and business topics.

For Monthly Premium: $29.99 monthly USD
For Annual Premium: $299.88 annual USD

If you choose to subscribe, your subscription will automatically renew and will charge your credit card through iTunes account, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings.

Requirements
• iPhone 4S or later, iPod Touch 5th Gen or later
• iOS 10 or later
• Connection to 3G, 4G, or WiFi network

LinkedIn privacy policy: https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy
LinkedIn terms of use: https://www.linkedin.com/legal/user-agreement

Engage the best talent anywhere, anytime using LinkedIn Recruiter – now from your iPhone.
 
Whether you’re at a conference, career fair, or running to your next interview, Recruiter Mobile offers you the key Recruiter features from your iPhone. Search and review profiles of potential hires, reach out and respond to candidates, and keep track of your team’s activity. There’s never been an easier way to find talent on the go.
 
Why you’ll love it:
· Find anyone – see full LinkedIn profiles of every member, even those outside your network
· Reach anyone – contact candidates via InMail messages, email, text, or phone
· Respond quickly – receive real-time alerts when candidates reply
· Stay connected – get updates on job applicants, saved search results, hiring manager reviews, and profile changes of candidates you follow
· Stay organized – save profiles of candidates to project folders, add notes, and view records of your team’s activity
 
** Note: Requires a LinkedIn Recruiter account. **

results.description:
【小红书APP】年轻人的生活方式平台，在这里发现美好、真实、多元的世界，标记吃穿玩乐买的生活日常。
 
【明星达人】时髦精黄子韬、实在人张雨绮、养生达人景甜、造型师林允、酷女孩欧阳娜娜、国际超模Karlie Kloss、好莱坞名媛金·卡戴珊……在小红书和偶像做邻居，从不一样的笔记中看到人气明星生活中的另一面。
 
【热门话题】get 潮流生活方式，从大热网综#国风美少年，到游戏战场#农药吃鸡初体验，从新奇惊艳的#牛奶辛拉面，到温暖励志的#我的高考故事，热门的话题活动都在小红书！
 
【美颜滤镜】梦幻效果的美颜滤镜相机，重新认识世界和你。打开小红书相机直接拍拍拍，扩展社交圈，让你的照片和短视频成为全世界小红薯们循环播放的存在吧！
 
【标签贴纸】海量标签随心标记，地点、品牌、话题涵盖美食、旅行、娱乐、影视综艺、时尚穿搭、护肤美妆的方方面面，随时随地标记生活；用可爱搞怪或奇特的贴纸装饰，生活日常瞬间鲜活精彩！
 
【全球好物】通过社区大数据，精挑细选年轻人最潮流、最好用、最新奇的热门商品；聚集国内外或知名或小众的品牌，带你找到全世界的好东西。
 
快下载小红书，和全世界好看有趣的年轻人一起标记生活吧！

results.description:
Find a job you love and get hired using Glassdoor job search. Access the latest job listings from companies hiring right now, and get an inside look at company reviews, salaries, benefits, and office photos shared by those who know the company best – the employees. Tap into the world’s most comprehensive career community to search job openings, discover your earning potential and see what it’s really like to work at thousands of companies worldwide.

Features:

Saved Job Searches
• A powerful job search tool that automatically finds the best new jobs for you among Glassdoor’s millions of job listings.
• Receive push notifications as soon as we find your new jobs
• Create a saved search for any job title and location of interest
• Easily see which jobs are new in the last day

Job Search
• Fast and easy-to-use job search with filters
• See company salaries, reviews and other information right from a job listing
• Save jobs or apply directly from your phone  so you'll never miss out on a good opportunity. Look for the “Apply on Phone” label
•  Swipe on a job listing to email it, view the company profile or follow the company and more

Salaries and Benefits
• Use the "Know Your Worth" tool to reveal how your market value has trended over time, how your market value compares to typical workers in the same field, and also plot your current base pay.
• See salary and compensation by company, job title and location
• Research averages and ranges for base salaries, bonuses, stock options and more
• Read about what benefits are offered and what employees think about them

Company Reviews 
• Read reviews from employees about the work environment, culture, senior leaders and more 
• View pros, cons, and advice to senior management
• Get opinions from current and former employees about specific companies

Follow Companies
• Follow your favorite companies to get the latest updates
• Easily find your way back to the companies you love on the “Companies” tab
• Get relevant suggestions of new companies to follow

Job Interview Questions & Reviews 
• Read reviews from applicants about the interview experience 
• See job interview questions that top companies are asking

The Glassdoor iPhone and iPad apps support iOS 10.0 and higher.

results.description:
Search jobs - find your next job or make your next career move NOW on SEEK! We make the job search and apply process easy. It doesn’t matter whether you’re in Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane, Perth, Auckland, Wellington or anywhere else in Australia or New Zealand – we have hundreds of thousands of jobs waiting for you. Get searching on Australia’s and New Zealand’s most visited and completely free job and employment marketplace!

READY TO FIND THE PERFECT JOB EASILY AND QUICKLY?
Simply search for jobs by letting us know the role, industry or location you’re after. Then you can easily refine your results by work type (full time, part time, casual or temp) or salary.
Effortlessly identify new jobs each time you come back to the app and save the jobs you like the sound of. Otherwise leave it up to us - we’ll recommend jobs we think are right for you!
Found a job you like? Apply for jobs faster with pre-filled application forms. 

NEED HELP KEEPING TRACK OF YOUR JOB SEARCH JOURNEY?
•	Run a search once – if you like it save it and we’ll make it easy to keep coming back to it
•	We’ll also make sure you’re aware of what jobs are new are what jobs you’ve already seen so you don’t have to think about it!
•	Jobs you’ve saved and applications you’ve submitted can be easily viewed on your ‘My Activity’ page

TIRED OF NOT HEARING BACK FROM AN EMPLOYER?
•	Don’t worry – SEEK can now tell you for some roles whether your application has been viewed or whether you are likely to progress or not. 

WANT TO GET A QUICK IDEA OF WHAT IT’S LIKE TO WORK SOMEWHERE?
It’s not just about finding the right job. You’re also looking for the right company to continue your career journey. SEEK’s Company Reviews is a place where you can find trusted information about companies, written anonymously by employees.

GOT FEEDBACK?
We want to hear from you! Let us know your thoughts by clicking ‘Feedback’ in the app, or email us at usersupport@seek.com.au.

results.description:
Uber 드라이버 앱 - 파트너를 위한 앱.

새로운 드라이버 앱으로 여유 시간에 수익을 올려 보세요. 드라이버 파트너들과 협력하여 제작된 드라이버 앱이 성공적인 운행에 필요한 모든 도구를 제공해 드릴 것입니다.

사람들과 물건이 원하는 곳으로 이동할 수 있게 도와주세요. 사무실도, 상사도 없습니다. 언제든 원하시는 시간에 운행하고 목적지로 향하는 모든 여정을 즐겨 보세요.

Uber 드라이버 앱에서 파트너로 가입하세요. 필요한 단계를 안내해 드리고 운행할 준비가 완료되면 알려 드리겠습니다.

더 스마트하게 수익을 올리는 방법
운행을 완료한 후 수익을 얼마나 올렸는지 지도에서 바로 확인하세요.
생활에 맞게 운행 일정을 조정하세요. 다음 요청까지 예상되는 시간과 다음 24시간 동안의 주변 라이더 활동 예측을 통해 하루를 손쉽게 계획할 수 있습니다.

필요한 지원
첫 운행의 긴장감을 떨쳐 버리세요. 앱을 처음 열면 자세한 사용 방법을 안내받으실 수 있습니다.
앱에 내장된 편리한 도구로 필요한 도움을 받고, 문제를 알리거나 궁금한 내용을 질문하세요.

*이 앱은 매월 약 2GB의 데이터를 사용합니다. 내비게이션을 사용하면 휴대폰의 배터리 사용 시간이 줄어들 수 있습니다.

Save time and manage all your social media in one place. Buffer is a simpler way to schedule posts and track the performance of your content on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest, and LinkedIn.

No more wasting time, no more logging into multiple social accounts. Any link, text, picture or video - just add it to Buffer and you can quickly choose when and where it’ll be posted.

Why you'll love Buffer...
• Share to multiple Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest and LinkedIn accounts from one place.
• Maintain a consistent presence on social media, so you can build your following and influence.
• Get easy-to-read analytics for every update you share.
• Schedule your posts automatically so you never have to worry about setting a time and date, or customize the timing of individual posts. Scheduling has never been easier or more flexible.

Buffer is available for iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, Apple Watch, Web and other phones and tablets.

You can also add to Buffer from your favourite browser using out Browser Extensions for Safari, Chrome, Firefox and Opera.

Buffer’s main version is free, but you can easily upgrade within the app.

results.description:
Writing an effective resume doesn't have to be hard. A precision targeted and professionally typeset resume is the key to scoring an interview. Simply fill in your information, and Resume Star produces a clean, correctly formatted PDF resume you can email directly, post online, or print out.

***** Thousands of Five-Star reviews! This is the real deal! *****

***** Featured by AppAdvice on "Today's Best Apps"! *****

BUILD A PROFESSIONAL RESUME IN MINUTES

Resume Star creates professional resumes using industry best practices:
- Using a battle-tested template with complete sections.
- Using the right fonts (did you know that many fonts don't appear the same on Mac and PC?).
- Including a targeted and properly addressed cover letter for each company.
- Avoiding gaudy colors and styles that send the wrong message.

SCORE THAT INTERVIEW, OR PAY US NOTHING!

There are many resume apps out there. Resume Star is different. Download it for free and use it unrestricted. Pay us only when you get the interview.

That's right, this is not a cut-down, limited free edition. It's the full featured App, and the best one you can buy. There are no annoying ads, or gotcha limits on creating and sending resumes. It has everything you need to score that interview.

Use the secure in-App purchase to pay us only when we've earned it.

Instead of you taking a risk in trusting an unknown App, we'll trust you instead. How's that for a change?

If you like this way of buying Apps, please be sure to let us know in the reviews section.

GET TO THE NEXT LEVEL, FAST

Resume Star is fine tuned to produce resumes that get the hiring manager's attention (in the right way), and get you in the door.

People are using Resume Star to get jobs every day. We're confident it can help you too.

Resume Star has a full feature set with everything you need:
- Creates cross-platform compatible PDF resumes
- Email resumes directly
- Print in-App right from your iPad or iPhone/iPod Touch
- Export to 3rd party Apps such as Dropbox to upload
- Create unlimited resumes, one for each company if you want
- 10 professionally drafted examples provide a starting point, or inspiration
- Use pre-defined sections or create custom ones
- Rearrange sections to suit your needs
- Create a specific cover letter for each company, properly addressed
- Integrated spell check to help avoid typos
- Optional fine adjustments to text and margin sizes to fit the page
- Live previews on the iPad

BONUS GUIDE

Also check out the in-depth guide, How to Score That interview With a Precision Targeted Resume. It's full of tips and tricks to get the most out of Resume Star.

It's included free for all Resume Star users. Access it from the options menu.

APPS YOU'LL LOVE

At Qrayon, we love building Apps that you'll find useful and actually enjoy to use. We hope that Resume Star helps, even in its small way, towards you getting your dream job.

If you like it, please be sure to let us know. We love to hear success stories. Oh, and do tell your friends about us too!

All the best in your journey,

-- All the App Makers @ Qrayon.

With jobs available in locations all over the UK, from London to Liverpool and Manchester to Birmingham, finding the right job has never been easier. You can also view vacancies from some of the world’s leading brands, from Amazon to Ocado, Sky to Vodafone and Domino’s to Nike.

results.description:
大街—招聘神器，让好工作主动找你！

当别人在苦苦搜索工作，你只要一键设置，就可以坐等HR发来邀约；当别人在四处打探公司内幕，你只要一键查询，公司薪水八卦全部曝光；当别人为错过机会而懊恼，你只要一键制定，就能随时随地接收投递反馈。
【实时机会】
实时接收最新的招聘职位、校招计划、面经攻略！
【私人定制】
随心订阅职位，精准推送符合你心意的优质机会！
【一键投递】
快捷投递简历、报名宣讲会，不错过任何好机会！
【实时消息】
随时随地接收投递反馈和HR留言，及时掌握进度！
【公司内幕】
几百万家公司的员工点评、薪水爆料，无价之宝！

【功能详解】
1、职位订阅
支持手机自定义订阅企业招聘全职、兼职以及实习职位，使求职者更加轻松寻找到合适的工作；
2、机会分类
机会分类展现，全职、校招、实习、兼职各类招聘职位任求职者挑选；
3、职位工资
求职者可轻松获取招聘职位的工资信息，无论全职、实习还是兼职岗位的工资不再是秘密；
4、简历管理
手机管理个人简历，求职者可以根据企业的招聘职位情况，随时编辑更新；
5、职位收藏
求职者可收藏感兴趣企业的全职职位，学生用户可收藏相关校招和实习兼职职位，不要漏掉每一个好机会；
6、投递反馈
及时查看招聘企业HR给出的投递反馈，求职进展、校招进程随时掌握；
7、职位邀约
招聘企业主动发起邀约，及时查看职位邀约，让机会找到你；
8、职位搜索
支持分类搜索，全职职位、名企校招、公司动态、实习职位任求职者搜索；
校招
学生用户专设校招求职专用通道，企业校招计划轻松获取；
10、实习
实习岗位一键获取，在关注校招的同时，方便学生用户轻松找到更合适的实习工作；
11、公司
公司频道帮求职者了解各家公司的招聘职位、校招计划、笔试面试攻略、公司点评、工资福利等；
12、发现
发现频道可以进行公司互动，讨论 招聘职位的工资、查看公司八卦，挑战职场小游戏。
 
【用户答疑】
1、刚上大一，注册大街网有什么用？
一方面可以找暑假、寒假的实习工作、课余兼职工作，积累社会经验；还可以查看企业校招计划、关注公司动态为日后参与企业校招、寻找全职工作做准备。
2、本人已有全职工作，想找份兼职工作，又怕在其他网站被骗？
用大街网找兼职工作不用担心，无论是全职职位、兼职职位还是实习职位，我们都有严格的审核体系，对招聘职位进行严格把关，保证安全可靠！
3、企业发布的招聘职位的工资怎么了解？
招聘企业在发布职位是会标注工资信息，如果没标注工资的职位，可以进入到该公司的公司互动页面，求职者可以在里面了解到工资等各类信息，学生用户还能了解到校招职位、实习以及兼职岗位的工资情况。
4、想找实习和兼职工作，怎么了解这个招聘企业？
可以到公司点评里面查看该招聘企业员工的点评，还可了解求职者互相发的笔试面试攻略，以及职位的工资信息，或许还可以找到能一起实习的小伙伴。
5、怎样了解企业的详细校招计划？
注册大街网，进入校招页面，有海量的企业的校招职位以及详细的校招计划，同时你还能看到该企业的其他全职、实习以及兼职的职位、员工的工资福利等一些招聘企业列详细的信息。
6、求职者怎样订阅合适自己的职位？
注册大街网，点击职位订阅，根据行业、职位、地点、工资等关键字选择合适求职者自身的职位订阅关键字，这样合适的全职、兼职、以及学生用户的校招、实习等职位会定时推送给您，不会漏掉任何一个求职机会。

7、某些全职职位的工资真实吗？
被标注的无论全职、兼职还是实习的工资信息都是招聘企业HR发布，经过审核后的，可以作为求职参考。
 
【用户评价】
1、校招的职位好多，投递简历真的好方便，今天投了几十个企业的校招职位，希望能找到好工作！
2、找工作变得更加方便，真是求职者的好帮手，本来想找全职的工作，偶然得到了个兼职的工作也不错，会继续用下去的。
3、有企业的人力发来邀约，感觉还挺靠谱的，现在的招聘企业都这么主动吗？老给我发都想换工作了呢，发来的职位工资都好高啊。
4、各家公司的面经、求职攻略看看还是挺有帮助的，为以后换工作提供参考。
5、招聘职位的工资直接标红处理了，第一眼就能看见醒目的工资，真是来仇恨呢！
6、感觉对大学生找工作更有着帮助，校招企业面试、笔试讨论的还挺激烈的。
7、用起来很舒服，能看到职位工资，谁看过简历还给发提醒，是找工作的神器！
8、推荐的招聘职位还挺合适的，写简历还挺简单的，直接用手机投简历，很方便。
9、想找实习的大三狗在上面找实习工作还挺容易的，大四的校招和以后找全职、兼职工作就靠你了！
10、找工作用上的，定位什么的很喜欢，全职职位非常多，兼职的工作在丰富点就更好了，是求职的好工具。
11、一直以为大街的校招很厉害，看了下招聘的全职岗位也很多，资源很丰富。企业的校招现在都好难啊，还是先找个实习工作积累下经验，希望能找到个靠谱的实习长经验。
12、某些兼职职位的工资都有发布，真的是很全面，下载一个用来找兼职挺方便的。
13、查看在招全职职位的时候可以根据自己的需要来筛选，挑起来还比较轻松。
14、无论是全职还是实习职位都标注了工资、地点、要求，不用再反复点进去看，省时省力。

Do you take pictures of whiteboards?  If so, this is a must have app for you.

Whiteboard Snap gives you a better way to organize and share your photos.  In a meeting or a classroom, this app saves you time and trouble—and gives you greater flexibility—in managing your whiteboard photos.

Unlike other photo apps, this app allows you to create neat folders for your photos, add comments to each photo and email multiple photos out as a single PDF.

**************************************************************
THE BEST WHITEBOARD PHOTO ORGANIZATION AND SHARING APP - QUICK & EASY
**************************************************************

** Create folders for different office meetings **
** Create folders for different classroom lectures **
** Email one or multiple photos as PDF **
** Attach comments to any photo **
** Store multiple photos in the same folder **
** Adjust contrast and brightness to enhance image quality **

Key features:
1.You can set up folders for different meetings or topics, you can store multiple photos in the same folder, and you can rearrange them as you like.

2. It is easy to email photos: you can select one or several photos from any folder, you can attach comments to any photo, and you can email a group of photos, all together, as a PDF file.

3. You can make your whiteboard photo more legible with our image enhancement tool, which allows you to increase the brightness and the contrast of the photo.

** Quick Folders: 
 With just one click you can start taking pictures of your meetings or add new folders for each meeting/topic to organize your pictures for quick search and sharing

** Send Multiple Pictures as PDF
You can select one or multiple pictures within any folder and email as PDF files

** Attach Notes to Pictures
You can select and attach a note to any picture. A great way to capture meeting notes. The notes and the picture can be emailed as a PDF file.

** Picture Preview
You can preview the picture and notes before sharing

** Image Quality
Improve the quality of your whiteboard picture with our auto-enhance tool. 


**************************************************************
TESTIMONIALS
**************************************************************

results.description:
Eight is the ultimate business card organizer and professional networking platform. Used by over 2 million people, Eight is an easy, convenient & completely free-to-use app.

Simply scan in any visiting cards you receive, and see them instantly put into a digital business cards holder. Eight uses a proprietary combination of OCR technology & human input to accurately digitize each card into a unique Eight profile, giving users a convenient database of their professional network with 99.9% accuracy!

Eight is also a powerful professional network and enables you to network with scanned business cards on the app. From a contact's profile, you can call, email, or view their address on a map. Eight users can share news & updates with their Eight network or even interact with each other through instant messages. 

Why Eight?
-	It scans business cards with 99.9% accuracy using both OCR & human transcription thus helping users to manage contacts and stay linked in conveniently and easily.
-	The standard version is free and includes scanning, organizing features. 
-	Users can purchase Eight Premium for quicker digitization and more benefits.
-	Users can sync their networks to their devices. Data is also automatically updated if connected contacts change the details on their business card.

What Eight has in store for you:

- Organize business cards & professional networks: 
Users often have a large stack of disorganized visiting cards & biz cards making them difficult to use and refer to. Eight is a free digital card holder that solves this problem by removing the need for manual entry. Now using your mobile cam, cards will be instantly digitized into an e visiting card, and you will be able to see full information of the card on the app. Additionally, once digitized, Eight lets users add notes & tags on profiles so they can manage contacts & organize their business & professional network efficiently. It's a digital card scanner, holder, reader & organizer consolidated in a single app.

- Manual input to ensure superior accuracy: 
Eight uses a combination of OCR technology & human resources to digitize business cards from a scanned image into a digital Eight profile. After users scan their biz cards, Eight uses OCR technology to instantly read the data on the visiting cards, which is then manually checked & corrected by our team, ensuring 99.9% accuracy even for the most hard-to-read cards. It's a perfect digital card maker as it easily converts visiting cards to e biz cards.

- Easy search feature to find & reach contacts from within the app: 
This is not your regular visiting cards scanner or digital business card holder. It allows users to manage contacts & contact them via email or phone, helping them unlock new business & career opportunities. It is especially helpful for salespeople and salesforce users to manage & convert leads.

- Free to use basic app with an option to buy premium features: 
The standard version of the app is free to use and has all the essential functions that make Eight a powerful business solution. Users can purchase Eight Premium for additional benefits including an ability to export their data (e.g. phonebook sync). It not only helps users to convert their visiting cards & biz cards into e business cards using OCR but also lets them export their e business card data to their devices.

- Networking: Eight stands out among others as it not only scans your business cards but also lets you stay linked in with your contacts who are themselves Eight users, by providing options such as private instant chat messaging and an activity feed thus providing you with ample business opportunities and timely updates from your network.

How does Eight compare to alternatives?
Camcard: Camcard and most other scanners only uses OCR, not human input, causing significantly lower accuracy.
Bric: Bric and others have scan limits, following which you have to pay. Eight is totally free and unlimited.

results.trackName: 思维简图 - 轻量级思维导图
results.description:
「思维简图」- 轻量的思维导图管理工具，只要会录入「！」就能创建和管理你的思维导图。
用户可以在手机上高效、便捷地使用思维导图，整理自己的想法。

进入创建页面，用不同数量的感叹号来表示后面的文字在树状图中属于第几级，
界面左侧提供了快速录入感叹号的按钮，可以快速录入 1-3 个感叹号。
如果需要录入更多感叹号，可以手工直接录入四个甚至更多感叹号。

进入某一个文件夹内，即可看到自己保存的思维简图列表。
点击任一列表项目，即可进入思维简图查看页面，你可以用手势操作来移动或缩放简图。
缺省状态下采用树状图形式显示，你也可以通过菜单选则步骤图和清单图查看。

在树状图模式下，点击页面右下角按钮，可以看到如下按钮：

- 清单图，切换为清单图显示。
- 步骤图，切换为步骤图显示。

在清单图模式下，点击页面右下角按钮，可以看到如下按钮：

- 图形方案，切换为步骤图或树状图显示。
- 配色方案，切换多种主题颜色显示。

在步骤图模式下，点击页面右下角按钮，可以看到如下按钮：

- 图形方案，切换为清单图或树状图显示。
- 配色方案，切换多种主题颜色显示。
- 列数，调整一行显示的步骤数。

两种方式备份自己创建的简图：
- 在侧栏菜单中点击“导出简图”，填写从PC端提示的连接码,将手机上的简图传到PC端保存。需要时，可以使用「导入简图」功能将它们导入到任一手机中。
- 将简图备份到云端（Taguage.com）。首先在“简图设置”中点击“设置「Taguage」帐号”，用你的「Taguage」账户登录；然后在任意一个简图列表中点击「备份」按钮，即可将其保存到 Taguage.com

官网：Taguage.com
官微：@Taguage
官方订阅号：他瓜哥，关注后回复相应关键词，即可查看「思维简图 PC 版」，用户交流请在对话框留言加群。

results.description:
Weave is LinkedIn meets Tinder (minus the dating) - simply swipe left or right to chat with other like-minded local professionals. Meet CEOs, startup founders, VCs, recruiters and business experts from every field. App features:

• Conveniently use LinkedIn to create your Weave account
• Filter and search professionals by city, neighborhood, title, and industry
• Browse other professionals and swipe right on those you want to meet 
• Chat in-app when both users express an interest to meet
• Join different “Rooms” for specific networking needs
• 5 different Rooms: General Networking, Fundraising, Hiring, Looking for Co-Founder and Services
• Call an Uber directly from the Weave app to pick you up for your meeting!
• Free to join, free to use

General Networking Room
Join Weave's General Networking Room to meet other like-minded, local professional in your community. Expanding your professional network has never been easier!

Fundraising Room
The Weave Fundraising Room is great for people who are looking to raise money for a new business or specific cause. Join this room to meet venture capitalists who are looking for the next big idea and like-minded people who are passionate about solving the same problem. 

Hiring
Over 70% of jobs are found through networking - The Weave Hiring Room is a great place to meet hiring managers and recruiters from the best companies in your area. 

Looking for a CoFounder Room
Join Weave's CoFounder room to connect and find other passionate entrepreneurs in your community who want to solve the same problem.

Have a private networking event or conference? Want to give your attendees the flexibility to network before, during and after the event? Contact Weave (hello@weave.in) to create a private networking Room only accessible with an invite code.

results.releaseNotes: Truffls entwickelt sich stets weiter und somit auch unser App-Design. In den letzten Wochen haben wir daran gearbeitet unsere App zu verschönern, damit die Jobsuche noch mehr Spaß macht. Jetzt freuen wir uns Dir das Ergebnis präsentieren zu können. Du hast natürlich weiterhin alle bewährten Funktionen, die unsere App ausmachen - nur im brandneuen Look. Schau doch mal wieder rein und gib uns Feedback!
results.description:
Vergiss das Chaos aus Stellenangeboten in Jobbörsen und Jobcentern, die alle ähnlich klingen und Dir doch nicht zu 100% gefallen. Mit truffls haben wir eine Job App entwickelt, die die Wünsche und Bedürfnisse der Bewerber in den Vordergrund stellt. Spar Dir das Bewerbungsschreiben und gewinne wertvolle Zeit.
Du legst einmalig Deinen Lebenslauf an und unser ständig lernender Algorithmus schlägt Dir ausschließlich die für Dich relevanten Jobs vor. Gefällt Dir ein Job? Swipe nach rechts und schon erhält der Recruiter Deine Bewerbung.


FÜR PROFESSIONALS UND BERUFSEINSTEIGER


Truffls ist die Jobbörse für Dich, wenn Du bereits einige Jahre Berufserfahrung hast oder Du gerade dein Studium hinter Dir hast und der Berufseinstieg auf Dich wartet. Wir bringen Dich mit Unternehmen zusammen, die wirklich zu Dir passen und in denen Du Deine Potenziale entfalten und über Dich hinauswachsen kannst.


MATCHE MIT SPANNENDEN UNTERNEHMEN


Ob im Bereich Marketing & Kommunikation, Vertrieb & Verkauf, Human Resources, IT oder Administration - In der truffls Job App wirst Du fündig. Bei uns gibt es Jobs in Start-ups, mittelständischen Unternehmen oder großen namhaften Konzernen - in Vollzeit, Teilzeit oder Selbstständigkeit. In der truffls Job App findet jeder die perfekte Stelle, der mehr von sich und seinem Job erwartet. Unser kompetentes Team unterstützt Dich dabei tatkräftig.


VIER SCHRITTE ZUM SWIPE


1. Fülle Dein Bewerbungsprofil aus: In der App, am PC oder als Verknüpfung zu XING.
2. Sage uns, wie Du arbeiten möchtest und in welchem Berufsfeld. Unser Algorithmus sucht dann die für Dich relevanten Stellen heraus und schlägt sie Dir vor.
3. Sagt Dir ein Job zu, swipest Du einfach nach rechts und dein Profil wird anonym und sicher an den Recruiter weitergeleitet.
4. Ist der Recruiter an Dir interessiert gibt es einen MATCH und ihr könnt euch im Messenger Nachrichten und Dokumente schicken. Dabei steht die Kommunikation auf Augenhöhe im Fokus.


WARUM TRUFFLS?


- Mehrwert: Wir sind mehr als nur eine Jobbörse. Unser Job ist es, Dir zu helfen, den Job zu bekommen, den Du verdienst. Die Unternehmen stellen sich mit ihrem Profil bei Dir vor und Du entscheidest, ob der Job zu Dir passt. Wir verstehen Dich und wissen, worauf es ankommt.
- Persönlich: Wir sind Deine Karriereberater. Wir helfen Dir Deinen Lebenslauf zu optimieren, geben Tipps für die Jobsuche und senden Dir Stellenangebote - schreibe uns einfach im truffls Job App Messenger.
- Bequem: Versende Bewerbungsunterlagen wie Lebenslauf oder Zeugnisse direkt per truffls Job App Messenger an Recruiter. Komplett sicher und ohne Umwege.
- Schnell: Ein Swipe genügt, um Deine Bewerbung einzureichen. Du legst einmal Dein Profil an und kannst es für jede Bewerbung verwenden.
Genau: Verfeinere Deine Jobsuche, indem Du positive und negative Keywords hinzufügst.
- Sicher: Deine Daten sind bei uns in guten Händen. Dein Profil wird komplett anonym an die Recruiter weitergeleitet.


BERECHTIGUNGEN


Standort teilen - damit wir Dir Jobs in Deiner Nähe anzeigen können.
Zugriff auf Speicher/Fotos/Medien/Dateien - dadurch wird Dein truffls Profil komplett. Lade ein Profilfoto hoch oder nutze einen Lebenslauf auf Deinem Handy, um Einträge in Dein truffls Profil zu importieren.
Identität - damit wir Dir automatisch die Konten zum Login vorschlagen können, die auf Deinem Telefon hinterlegt sind.


Hast Du Anregungen, Empfehlungen oder Wünsche an die truffls Job
App? Dann hilf uns dabei, noch besser zu werden und kontaktiere uns unter info@truffls.de - oder direkt im Messenger.


Weitere Informationen findest Du hier:


Webseite: https://www.truffls.de/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Truffls
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/truffls_jobapp
XING: https://www.xing.com/companies/truffls
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/truffls-gmbh/

results.description:
It happens that you don't have a business card with you when you meet someone new. Luckily you always carry your iPhone with you. This app enables you to share your contact info in a more convenient and effective way. 

And it's easy to use:

Step 1: Open the app and hand over your iPhone to a new contact.

Step 2: Your contact enters his or her email address.

Step 3: A nicely formated email with your contact info is constructed, ready to be send.

Step 4: Your email wil be added in CC, so you can now follow up with your new contact.

There is also a vCard file attached to the email, which contains all your info and can be imported to a digital address book automatically.

Or you just show the QR code including your contact info, even on the Apple Watch. Scan a QR code with the QR reader available in the app, and you can automatically import the contact in your address book.

It's also easy to setup. You are able to enter the following information:
First & last name
Personal website, email, phone number and extra details.
LinkedIn profile and Twitter feed.
Company name, website, email, phone number and details

Now meet new people, share your contact info and grow your network!

results.trackName: Поиск резюме на hh – HR Мобайл
results.description:
Вы в поиске идеального кандидата? Мобильное приложение HR Мобайл от HeadHunter поможет вам на этом нелегком пути подбора персонала. 

Неважно, где расположен ваш офис, в Москве или Санкт-Петербурге, в Нижнем Новгороде или Владивостоке! На hh.ru более 36 миллионов резюме* соискателей со всей России, из Белоруссии и Казахстана. 

Уже 18 лет hh.ru помогает работодателям в поиске персонала, а соискателям — в поиске работы мечты! 

С помощью приложения HR Мобайл вы можете: 

— Искать резюме подходящего кандидата на вашу вакансию: расширенный поиск резюме позволит вам настроить критерии поиска по городу, профессиональной области, опыту и графику работы.  

— Разместить и отредактировать вакансию: не забудьте описать, какой он, соискатель вашей мечты! И постарайтесь указать зарплату, на которую может этот соискатель претендовать. Таким образом вы сможете избежать лишних вопросов перед собеседованием, а соискатель не будет испытывать неловкость.  

— Работать с избранными резюме: отметьте в поиске, кто действительно нравится, и добавьте их резюме в отдельную папку. Даже если соискатель не подходит на открытую вакансию, его резюме может понадобиться вам чуть позднее.  

— Работать с резюме из общего поиска: настраивать отображение полей по вашему усмотрению, делиться им с вашими коллегами. 

— Приглашать на собеседование подходящих кандидатов, отвечать на отклики и следить за новыми резюме кандидатов по вашему поисковому запросу. 

Более 36 миллионов резюме* ждут вас на hh.ru! 

Успехов в поиске персонала! 

Команда HeadHunter.
*36 миллионов резюме, размещенных на сайте hh.ru в любом статусе видимости по состоянию на 19.10.2018 год, данные сайта hh.ru.

results.trackName: GeoJob - Find job openings around you
results.description:
Are you looking for a job? GeoJob app displays job openings around you in an Augmented Reality view. Searching for a job has never been so easy!

WHY?
 
People are increasingly looking for jobs in locations near their homes, specially in traffic jammed cities where public transportation is an issue.

FOR WHOM?
 
Job Seekers all over the world who wish to find a job using geographic criteria. 
You can use the phone's camera to see your surroundings with an augmented reality layer to find jobs around you. 
Excellent for those who want to find a job near home in a traffic jammed city full of buildings.

FOR WHAT?
 
You turn on the app and immediately see job openings around you. By clicking on the job, you get an info screen with more details about the company, job openings and the ability to easily send the company your résumé. 

WHERE?
 
GeoJob initially works in the following countries: USA, Belgium, Canada, China, France, Germany, Greece, India, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland and in the UK!

GEOJOB FEATURES:
- Login with Linkedin account.
- Filter job openings per category.
- Use your GPS location to find only the job openings around you.
- Display them in an AR view, or map view, or table view.
- Apply directly from the app, sending your resume.


 
Designed and Coded in Naples, Italy, Produced in São Paulo, Brazil, and crowdfunded by many individuals worldwide who believed searching for a job around you should be easier and more intuitive. A whole new experience!

results.description:
Apply to over 1 million jobs with one tap! 100% Free!

JobSwipe is a revolutionary new app featuring an intelligent job search that gets smarter each time you use it. Find your next job today with Jobswipe.

**How it works**

Start your new job search by registering on Jobswipe and editing your work profile. Jobswipe uses your current industry information and your preferred job titles to scan and search for new jobs nearby. Online job search was never easier!

- The app searches MILLIONS of new jobs to find perfect job matches nearby (or near to a specified location). Access top jobs in your area with a single tap.

- The job matches are then displayed in a stack. 

- You can view each job and swipe left to delete or right to shortlist the job.

- Jobswipe uses the Adswipe intelligent search technology to improve the quality of your job matches based on your previous swipes. Find part time jobs, full time jobs, student jobs, or graduate jobs and even more by simply swiping.

- If you shortlist a job, the app will look for similar jobs and promote these jobs in the results. Jobswipe is indeed the smartest UK job search app out there. Find your next job today! 

- If you delete a job, Jobswipe will not show you the same job or similar jobs.
- Upload your CV or resume on the app for better opportunities. Make your recruitment process faster and simpler.

**App Features** 

- Unlike online job search websites, you only have to enter your search criteria once.

- JobSwipe can detect your location and find a job nearby.

- You can set alternative locations and easily switch between these locations using the Location tab. You can also increase the search distance from these locations.

- Shortlisted jobs are also emailed to you so you can apply from a desktop.

- Email and push notifications keep you updated if you get new job matches.

- Deleted jobs can be viewed and shortlisted if a mistake has been made.

Find your new job today with the top jobs search app in the UK! Edit your work profile, upload your CV or resume and start applying to part time jobs, full time jobs, student jobs, graduate jobs, and so much more. Get smarter suggestion everytime you swipe. Say goodbye to your recruitment woes and find a job fast. Indeed job search becomes easier with Jobswipe.

Jobswipe uses Adswipe's Intelligent Search Technology [US Patent Pending]

results.description:
Même pendant vos déplacements, accédez aux plus de 13'000 offres d'emploi provenant de plus de 9’000 entreprises, créez des JobMailer, suivez des employeurs attractifs & offres d’emploi, postulez en un clic et rédigez des évaluations d’entreprises. Avec notre plateforme d’emploi, vous avez tout ce qu’il vous faut pour votre recherche d’emploi !

Pourquoi utiliser l’application jobup.ch ? 

1 – ACCÉDEZ GRATUITEMENT À TOUS LES JOBS de Suisse romande depuis une seule application. jobup.ch, plateforme n°1 de l’emploi en Suisse romande, vous propose le plus grand nombre d’offres d’emploi ainsi qu’un large choix d’entreprises.

2 – RECHERCHE PAR MOT-CLÉ : Votre profession figure dans plusieurs secteurs et catégories ? Pas de problème, vous pouvez aussi utiliser la recherche par mot-clé pour trouver votre prochain emploi.

3 – RECHERCHE PAR ENTREPRISE & ÉVALUATIONS D’ENTREPRISES : Faites-vous une idée de votre prochain employeur grâce aux portraits d’entreprise. Évaluez vos employeurs ainsi que les entreprises où vous avez postulé et obtenez un aperçu du fonctionnement d’employeurs potentiels grâce aux évaluations des autres utilisateurs.

4 – RECHERCHES RÉCENTES : Gagnez du temps en consultant vos dernières recherches effectuées car nous les avons sauvegardées pour vous.

5 – SUIVEZ DES ENTREPRISES : Suivez les entreprises qui vous intéressent et vous recevrez une notification automatique lorsque de nouvelles offres d’emploi ou évaluations de ces dernières sont publiées.

6 – POSTULEZ directement : Postulez via l’application grâce à votre profil jobup.ch ou votre adresse email.

7 – JOBMAILER : Ne ratez plus aucune opportunité d’emploi grâce aux notifications push, qui vous informent des dernières offres d’emploi publiées.

8 – SAUVEGARDEZ DES OFFRES D’EMPLOI : Pendant vos déplacements, sauvegardez les annonces intéressantes en cliquant simplement sur le cœur. Vous les trouverez ensuite sous « Mes emplois ». Conseil : Une fois que les offres d’emploi ne sont plus en ligne, vous pouvez toujours y avoir accès si vous les avez sauvegardées.

9 – MON PROFIL personnel : Créez votre profil sur notre application et personnalisez votre recherche d’emploi.

10 – Recherche PERSONNALISÉE : Nous vous soutenons de façon personnalisée dans votre recherche en mettant à votre disposition des catégories et des filtres de recherche.

11 – FEEDBACK : Il vous manque une fonctionnalité ? Ou peut-être avez-vous des suggestions concernant notre application ? Contactez-nous directement grâce au formulaire intégré ou par email à l’adresse candidat@jobup.ch.

12 – RECOMMANDATION : Une offre d’emploi vous a fait penser à un(e) ami(e) ? Partagez l’annonce grâce à la fonction de recommandation.

Bonne chance pour votre recherche d’emploi avec notre application !
Votre équipe jobup.ch

• In order to improve security and address user feedback, Kalido no longer automatically adds users as your contacts based on phone book data
• Now you’ll see a “My Personal Network” network, which lets you individually manage your personal connections by sending and accepting requests
• When expanding your personal network, you can now search for anyone in your existing networks, and anyone else who has chosen to be findable on Kalido, and request to add them. Once you’ve made a request, and the other person has accepted, they will be part of your personal network
• In Settings, you can manage your search visibility, to choose whether anyone can find you, or only people in your networks
• We have replaced the default public environment that all users previously belonged to with a set of geographic networks: These networks are automatically created for countries, cities, and neighbourhoods where Kalido users are active. Anyone can join these networks, allowing everyone an easy way to understand the communities around them. For companies and schools, this also means that during onboarding, a user can choose to join only your private network, creating the option of a completely private Kalido experience for them from Day One
• Private network admins can now specify an email domain (e.g. my company.com) that will allow anyone with an @mycompany.com email address to automatically join a specific private network
• When signing up, in addition to adding any custom skill you want, we’ve made it easier to select skills you have, and skills you are looking for, from a curated list
• When signing up,  we now suggest people that you might know, to make building your personal network easier
• To improve navigation, the bottom tab bar is now visible at all times, unless you are in an uninterruptible flow (e.g. when recommending someone, introducing someone, or adding a skill, search or interest to your profile). This means you can now navigate into a screen within the Networks tab, and still have one-tap access to the Nearby tab, for example.
• Our matching AI has learned to be better and faster, so now you'll get higher quality matches in less time across a broader set of skill concepts
• Improved performance for chat, matching, network, and nearby views, making it easier to interact with networks that have thousands of members
• More than 100 small bug fixes and minor experience improvements across the board
results.description:
Your network is one of your most valuable assets. At its full potential, it can unlock a whole world of opportunities. But if you’re like most people, building, maintaining, and getting value from your networks is hard. You are surrounded by opportunities: but to capture them, you need a way to see them. Kalido works constantly to help you uncover opportunities to use your skills; find people who have skills you need; and expand your network in ways that create value for you and the people you add.

This empowers you to offer skills and services, find skilled professionals and meet potential clients, with trust at the core of every interaction. Simply by responding to two simple prompts “I want to meet…” and “I can provide…” and sharing your contacts, you unleash the power of Kalido to find unique and trusted matches for you.

Kalido drives incredible networking value for enterprises, schools, conference organisers and attendees.  For enterprises: Kalido enables better onboarding for new joiners (including temporary hires like freelancers and consultants). For schools, Kalido allows alumni to stay connected wherever they are in the world, hire each other more easily, and get introductions and referrals to trusted and skilled people through a community they trust. For conference organisers, attendees find live networking opportunities through immediate matching and browsing, so they can meet, converse and exchange value in minutes.  For everyone else, Kalido removes the middleman, and replaces anonymous reviews with trusted recommendations.

Kalido acts as your marketplace for people.  It will find you an awesome local web designer, it will allow you to introduce your friend, who is a freelance photographer, to your private trusted network of local entrepreneurs. It will allow you to make money from your hobby and introduce you to people looking for your skills. Kalido will tell you when a friend or colleague is nearby so you can catch up for that overdue coffee which may lead to a big career opportunity you hadn’t even thought of. It will do all of this, perpetually, infinitely, daily. For free.

We believe that there should be a level playing field and people should have the environment to create opportunity for themselves no matter who they are.  That’s why we built Kalido.

● Nearby: You are surrounded by talented individuals who can offer useful skills, and Kalido can help you discover them. More importantly, it can help you be discovered too, maybe for local jobs or freelance opportunities. No matter where you are in the world Kalido will tell you who’s around.

● Networks: Join networks to see and match with relevant people nearby, wherever you are in the world. Search and share opportunities with fellow alumni and colleagues. Meet up, chat with, and get introductions to new business clients, professionals, or other alumni. Create your own customised and secure private network and invite colleagues and friends to join.

● Introductions: Do you have a connection who needs to hire a photographer for an upcoming project? Perhaps your friend is a freelance photographer? Why not introduce them to each other online? Kalido gives you the ability to refer and be referred because everybody knows someone.

● Chat: Call, text, or meet up with your matches and trusted contacts directly. Use pre-defined icebreakers to help you get things off the ground and network.

● Trusted matches: we match you with the right people, enabling freelancers to meet new clients, start networking, outsource and succeed in their career. We prioritize matches who have shared contacts, shared networks and are nearby.

● Offer freelancing services: we provide business and job opportunities to freelancers and small businesses to offer their services. Freelancers can meet professional clients who value their work and get jobs at a fair price. Kalido will be your online cv to showcase your skills and experience.

results.description:
BUILD A PROFESSIONAL RESUME IN MINUTES

Writing an effective resume doesn't have to be hard. A precision targeted and professionally typeset resume is the key to scoring an interview. Simply fill in your information, and Resume Star produces a clean, correctly formatted PDF resume you can email directly, post online, or print out.

Resume Star creates professional resumes using industry best practices:
- Using a battle-tested template with complete sections.
- Using the right fonts (did you know that many fonts don't appear the same on Mac and PC?).
- Including a targeted and properly addressed cover letter for each company.
- Avoiding gaudy colors and styles that send the wrong message.

SCORE THAT INTERVIEW, OR PAY US NOTHING!

There are many resume apps out there. Resume Star is different. Download it for free and use it unrestricted. Pay us only when you get the interview.

That's right, this is not a cut-down, limited free edition. It's the full featured App, and the best one you can buy. There are no annoying ads, or gotcha limits on creating and sending resumes. It has everything you need to score that interview.

Use the secure in-App purchase to pay us only when we've earned it.

Instead of you taking a risk in trusting an unknown App, we'll trust you instead. How's that for a change?

If you like this way of buying Apps, please be sure to let us know in the reviews section.

GET TO THE NEXT LEVEL, FAST

Resume Star is fine tuned to produce resumes that get the hiring manager's attention (in the right way), and get you in the door.

People are using Resume Star to get jobs every day. We're confident it can help you too.

Resume Star has a full feature set with everything you need:
- Creates cross-platform compatible PDF resumes
- Email resumes directly
- Print in-App right from your iPad or iPhone/iPod Touch
- Export to 3rd party Apps such as Dropbox to upload
- Create unlimited resumes, one for each company if you want
- 10 professionally drafted examples provide a starting point, or inspiration
- Use pre-defined sections or create custom ones
- Rearrange sections to suit your needs
- Create a specific cover letter for each company, properly addressed
- Integrated spell check to help avoid typos
- Optional fine adjustments to text and margin sizes to fit the page
- Live previews on the iPad

BONUS GUIDE

Also check out the in-depth guide, How to Score That interview With a Precision Targeted Resume. It's full of tips and tricks to get the most out of Resume Star.

It's included free for all Resume Star users. Access it from the options menu.

APPS YOU'LL LOVE

At Qrayon, we love building Apps that you'll find useful and actually enjoy to use. We hope that Resume Star helps, even in its small way, towards you getting your dream job.

If you like it, please be sure to let us know. We love to hear success stories. Oh, and do tell your friends about us too!

All the best in your journey,

-- All the App Makers @ Qrayon.

results.description:
AroundThen makes business networking easier - allowing you to view, message and connect with nearby users on LinkedIn and Enterprise Social Networks, including Microsoft Office 365, Yammer and Salesforce Chatter.
 
From iOS 9 onwards, Bluetooth Low Energy is used to track the proximity of nearby AroundThen users, up to 50 feet away. All of the nearby AroundThen users are displayed in order of proximity, allowing you to view their profiles and connect immediately, or up to a week afterwards.
 
You can also check-in and share your location as an update on LinkedIn, Yammer or Chatter.
 
AroundThen is fully compatible with iPhone 4s and above, iPad 3 and above, and iPad Mini. Bluetooth Low Energy is not supported on earlier models, however the app will still function via location check-in.

DrumUp is a powerful social media management and content curation app for Twitter, Facebook and Linkedin. 

DrumUp discovers the coolest and the most relevant content from around the web for you to read and share with your social followers. Not only that, DrumUp is your complete social media manager - you can schedule posts and manage content across multiple Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter accounts from a single social media dashboard. 

Key features:

Daily fresh content recommendations 
Schedule custom and curated posts to multiple Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter accounts in one go
Super smart workflow designed to cut down time by up to 90% on social media management
Schedule posts for your social media accounts with one click
Automatic, custom date-time and repeat scheduling options
RSS feeds to curate content
Content library to save your best posts in categories and re-schedule later
Hashtag and @mention recommendations 
GIFs and Emoji library for your posts 
Shorten URLs for better readability 
Auto-post from your blog to Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn
Employee advocacy


DrumUp mines through tons of content from around the web using advanced algorithms to recommend the most relevant and interesting content. Whether you are tracking your industry or sharing thought provoking and engaging content to kick-start meaningful conversations with your followers, DrumUp is an easy to use, free, daily app for social media management, content discovery, content curation and employee advocacy.

Social media marketing starts with great content - Drum Up Your Social Media Presence Today!


Would you like to ask us anything? 
Contact us at https://drumup.io/contact

Connect with us on social
Twitter: @drumupio
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/drumupio

results.description:
SparksFly™ simplifies and unifies the repeated steps you take participating in all your social feeds. One app, one screen lets you view and post all user-content regardless of what social media platform is it on. You gain “intelligent control” over searching, sorting and curating all of your feeds - control to know something before others do, to know more than others do - control to be more well-informed all from what is already flowing through your social mobile apps. SparksFly™ brings people, brands, ideas and relevant real-time information closer together than ever before. 

SparksFly™ Patent-pending Artificial Intelligence 
We took another GIANT leap forward in the evolution of social media by applying our multi-patent-pending AI Engine to all the content across your selected social networks within the SparksFly™ app. Our engine “discovers and surfaces” uniquely relevant pieces of content, facts, trends, places, people, topics and ideas, “Sparks”, that would have been impossible to discover on your own culling through thousands of posts across multiple social networks in real time. The more our AI engine learns about what you do, like and dislike in your feeds, the brighter and more frequent the “Sparks” fly. Sparks come from from the collection of content flowing through ALL of your feeds together NOT Twitter, or Facebook, or Instagram, etc. separately. 

SparksFly’s™ single screen and individualized AI engine enable anyone who uses more than one social network to keep up with ALL content and get ahead of its collective meaning. It's a MUST HAVE for those who use social to be in-the-know or want to be one of the first-to-know without the massive time commitment required today. 

Social simplified. It's about time.

Get the App Now!

results.description:
VieLoco is the new, fun and unique way to make meaningful relationships with people near and afar based on shared passions in life! Looking for love, friends or both? VieLoco lets you explore someone's profile, photos, personal video, fun bio facts, and interests in life, while also chatting, live streaming, and sending unique gifts and experiences. Discover your mutual passions and make it happen!

*More meaningful matches
*More than a photo
*More soul

VieLoco, how it works: 
-    Sign-up with Facebook or email, fill in some fun bio facts, upload photos and a personal video on your profile page!
-    Pick your passions in life, click your active ones so we may match you with cool people and you may explore your mutual passions!
-    Set your preferences, search by age, distance, location, gender and passion!
-    Discover interesting people, explore their photos, video, passions and bio then swipe ‘down’ to your heart if you like the person, or ‘up’ if you don’t, it’s anonymous!
-    When you both like each other, it’s a match, you may chat, send photos, video streams, all for FREE and go meet to share your passions!
-    Don’t worry, Déjà vu will allow you to see people you have passed on before, it’s free!
-    VieLoco keeps track of your likes, so you may get noticed by sending virtual gifts. Both men and women may buy and send gifts!
-    Surprise someone or break the ice with a virtual gift to start a chat now, even if you are not a match!


VieLoco was designed for people looking for great matches and more meaningful relationships
VieLoco believes your privacy is important, and your location is never shared, and you may block users
Downloading VieLoco and using the service is completely Free. The gift feature is optional for both men and women. Users get ten free Blue Diamonds when they first sign up!

results.description:
FreelancerViet.vn là sàn giao dịch việc làm tự do đầu tiên tại Việt Nam kết nối nhà tuyển dụng với freelancer.
Chúng tôi tạo ra 1 sàn giao dịch công việc tự do cho các Nhà tuyển dụng (Job-Owner) đăng việc tìm người thực hiện tốt nhất hoặc chủ động tìm kiếm các freelancer theo mong muốn. Thành viên tại FreelancerViet dễ dàng tạo 1 profile cá nhân với portfolio hoàn chỉnh, tạo sự thuận tiện khi thể hiện năng lực bản thân trong cộng đồng và với khách hàng, dễ dàng tìm thấy công việc phù hợp tăng thêm thu nhập.

Giao dịch của Chủ dự án và Freelancer được thực hiện an toàn và đảm bảo thông qua chức năng “Giữ cọc dự án” trên freelancerViet.

FreelancerViet được biết đến thông qua cộng đồng Facebook từ năm 2010, bản Beta trên website hoạt động từ tháng 9 năm 2013, đến Tháng 3 năm 2015 bản chính thức ra đời với hơn 35,000 thành viên và tổng giá trị dự án lên hơn 12 tỷ đồng với 2,500 công việc.

FreelancerViet hiện đang được sở hữu bởi Công ty Cổ Phần Dịch Vụ Nhân Sự và Truyền Thông Flamingo. Là 1 trong những dự án online quan trọng mang tầm chiến lược của công ty. Theo kế hoạch, FreelancerViet sẽ được đầu tư phát triển mạnh mẽ hơn để trở thành nơi tìm việc freelance tin cậy cho cộng đồng và giúp doanh nghiệp tiết kiệm đáng kể chi phí nhân sự.

results.trackName: iViệc: Tìm việc làm - nhân lực
results.description:
iViệc cung cấp giải pháp việc làm thời vụ tin cậy hàng đầu tại Việt Nam. Tự hào là thị trường số dễ tiếp cận và dễ sử dụng nhất, iViệc cho phép người tuyển dụng và người lao động tìm kiếm, trao đổi và gặt hái thành quả công việc của mình.

DANH MỤC VIỆC LÀM: đa dạng với hàng ngàn nhân lực luôn trong tình trạng sẵn sàng
-	Sự kiện quảng bá
-	Dịch thuật/ Biên tập
-	Gia sư
-	Tiếp thị/ Điều tra thị trường
-	Tiệc nhà hàng, tiệc cưới
-	Sửa chữa, lắp đặt tại nhà
-	Lao động chân tay
-	Giúp việc nhà
-	Dịch vụ vận chuyển
-	Khác: Thiết kế, thu âm,…

TÍNH NĂNG
•	Chuyển đổi linh hoạt 2 chế độ Tuyển dụng – Tìm việc cho phép bạn có thể vừa là người tuyển dụng đồng thời là người lao động trong thời gian nhàn rỗi.
•	Thuận tiện trao đổi giữa người tuyển dụng và người lao động thông qua tính năng Trò chuyện trong Ứng dụng.
•	Áp dụng hệ thống đánh giá mức độ uy tín với cả người tuyển dụng và người lao động
•	Mạng lưới kết nối tới hàng ngàn lao động thời vụ giúp bạn giải quyết công việc trong thời gian nhanh nhất
•	Thanh toán an toàn trong Ứng dụng sau khi hoàn thành công việc.

DỄ DÀNG THAO TÁC
1.	Chọn danh mục việc làm
2.	Điền mức giá và số lượng nhân lực cần tuyển
3.	Chọn người phù hợp nhất trong danh sách người ứng tuyển
4.	Nếu bạn có thời gian và nhu cầu kiếm thêm thu nhập: Đăng sẵn tin chào giá để người tuyển dụng chủ động liên hệ với bạn

Đối với người tuyển dụng:
•	Đăng việc miễn phí
•	Tìm được nhân lực chỉ với vài thao tác trên điện thoại
•	Tham khảo hồ sơ và đánh giá của người lao động để chọn được nhân lực phù hợp nhất cho công việc

Đối với người lao động:
•	Cơ hội tăng thêm thu nhập
•	Tiếp cận mạng lưới rộng lớn những nhà tuyển dụng đang khát nhân lực
•	Tích luỹ kinh nghiệm làm việc, tăng mức độ uy tín và chất lượng lao động của mình

SỬ DỤNG iViệc NGAY TỪ HÔM NAY
Liên hệ với chúng tôi tại https://iviec.vn

results.description: Invoice Go makes it easy for freelancers and small to medium business owners to live, work, invoice and accept payments anywhere. Create invoices in minutes, accept credit cards, and monitor when invoices are sent, paid, or overdue. All of this can be done whilst on the go.

Blocks with 3 game modes;

1.Classic mode is the traditional play, a total of 25 levels, the higher the level the faster the blocks fall;
2.Round mode, on the basis of traditional gameplay, sets a target number of rows for the player. There are some blocks presetted as  obstacles in some levels, in order to increase the player’s desire to challenge;
3. Puzzle mode lets the player choose the block he or she currently want to use, and places it at a particular position to eliminate all blocks no the screen. It makes the player excited with the pleasure of thinking.

4.It is best for the player to log on to the Game Center when he(she) is playing.
5.The best scores and the best rows obtained by the player in the Classic mode and the total scores and the total rows obtained in the Classic mode and the Round Mode, will be submitted to the Game Center.
6. Players can compare their scores with others in the leaderboard.

How to play:
1. Move blocks to the left: click the “move left”button or swipe left on the screen.
2. Move blocks to the right: click the “move right”button or swipe right on the screen.
3. Rotate blocks: click the “rotate”button or tap the screen.
4. Fast fall: click the “fast fall”button or swipe down on the screen.

results.description:
This app beautifully displays quotes from all over the world to help you get motivation to work.You can choose to use the app simply as it is, or customize to your liking using more than ten features (most number of features for a quotes app). 
We have been receiving great reviews, with an average of 4.7 stars.

[List of functions]

- Quote display
- Favorites
- Autoplay
- Background and text design customization
- Play only favorites
- VoiceOver
- Regular notification with your favorite quote
- BGM
- Snow animation
- ... and many more (details below in [Function Details]!)

[Function Details]

- Quote display

We will deliver only the best quotes, carefully picked from around the world. Every time you press the switch in the Quotes page, a new inspirational quote appears.
Quotes will be added regularly, and you don't have to update the app to get them. You could also switch between different languages at any point from the Settings page (left swipe from the Quotes page).

- Favorites

You can "favorite" a quote by tapping the star icon in the Quotes page. 
You can see your favorites list from the Settings page. You could also display only the favorites during Autoplay (when using Autoplay feature), or set a quote from your favorites list as a notification message.

- Autoplay

You could let the app do the switching by tapping the triangle button on the Quotes page. If you feel tired of pressing the switch every time, please try this function. While the triangle icon is rotating, it is in Autoplay mode. You could end Autoplay mode by tapping anywhere on the screen. You could also change the time interval for Autoplay from the Settings page. Autoplay can be used at the same time as VoiceOver.

- Background and text design customization

Swipe to the right to go to the Design Settings page. You could change background image and text design to your liking. Go ahead and look for your favorite combination of background, text color, and text shadow color. 
Tip: It tends to look good if you choose the same color for both text color and text shadow color.
Text size can be changed from the Settings page.

- VoiceOver

Unlike any other quotes app, we have VoiceOver function (reading the quotes out loud). This feature is compatible in Japanese and English.
Please do understand that it may sound mechanical at times. You could change the overall tone of the voice from the Settings page.

- Regular notification

Go to Settings -> xxx time -> "choose message" to register a message from your favorites list as a notification message. Use this to remind and motivate yourself each day.

- BGM

How about reading inspirational quotes while listening to calm, natural background music? You can choose from three types of sounds from the nature from the Settings page. You could use this to relax before going to bed.

- Snow animation

As a small gift to users, we prepared a snow animation. Go to the Settings page and turn the feature on, go back to the Quotes page, and let the sakura fall gently down your screen. True, it might block your view a little. But I think it is sometimes nice to feel the nature while reading inspirational quotes. 

- Share with friends

Tap the arrow icon on the Quotes page, to show a selection of media to share. Currently we have twitter, facebook and LINE. 
You could also save the image to your camera roll. Turn on your friend's "switch" by sharing your favorite quote. 

- Finally

There are more features than what we have explained above, and we are certain that this app will satisfy any quote lover.
We are also doing regular updates to accommodate to the latest OS and features. Please try this app out and see how you like it.

results.description:
이 응용 프로그램은 많은 양의 정보를 기억하는 데 도움이됩니다. 당신이해야 할 유일한 것은 "백업으로 신용 카드와 수표 파수꾼"의 모든 중요한 데이터를 추가하고 프로그램에 액세스 한 암호를 기억하는 것입니다. "백업으로 신용 카드와 수표지기"도 유지하고 신용 카드로 지불 수표를 첨부 할 수 있습니다.

"신용 카드 및 백업 수표 파수꾼 '유지 :
• 소유자와 신용 카드의 종류 (#, 이름, 유효 기간 등)에 대한 정보
신용 카드 • CVV의 \의 PIN 코드
• 신용 카드의 앞면과 뒷면의 사진
• 금융 정보
• 연락처 은행 정보
지불 확인에 대한 • 정보
지불 수표 • 사진

"백업으로 신용 카드와 수표 키퍼는"응용 프로그램을 저장하고 신용 카드의 사진을 유지하고뿐만 아니라 검사를 지불하는 데 도움이 :
• 그들에게 더 접근을 위해 신용 카드에 대한 정보를 유지하려면
• 결제의 역사를 만들기 위해 지불 수표를 유지하려면
• 카드가 분실되는 경우에 빠른 전화 걸기를하거나 운영자에게 문의
• 계정에서 직접 웹 페이지를 엽니 다
• 전자 메일 메시지를 작성
• 신속하게 정보를 찾으려면

모든 정보는 카탈로그에 배치 된 카드의 형태로 표시된다. 추가 정보는 표준 및 사용자 정의 템플릿을 모두 사용할 수있는 정보를 입력합니다.
정보의 백업은 별도의 장치에 대한 신용 카드 및 수표의 데이터베이스를 복제하고 데이터 손실을 방지 할 수 있습니다.
모든 위에서 언급 한 기능은 "백업으로 신용 카드와 수표 파수꾼"사업 사람들을위한 소중한 도구를합니다.
